oli saha meriyam niyojanaya karanne me amerikanu tharuna samajaye ek pathikadaki...wasara thihak gatha unada bath eka beda kawana ammala unta natha...upadhiya awasana wana thek kuli wadak ho kara kampas inna duwata ho puthata yawana ammala, thaththala unta natha...un aragala karanne jiwithaya dinannata misa, rate deshapalakayinta padam uganwannata noweya...kotinma kiyathoth pasalen iwath wana witama unta jiwithaye salasum atha...hina atha...eewa saba karagannata kalantharayak bala sitima, unta gataluwakda noweya...unta demapiya urumayen labena depala idam natha...ihata wahale sita, beheth peththa dakwa athi siyallama dolar walata awanathaya...eheth, yatharthaya nam un kisiwekuta hena noilla, jiwithaya soya ganimayi...
